page.title: 19Changing Times
page.content: An Old Lady Remembers We went to Naver House,the old folks' home in Thurso to interview some old people about Thurso before Dounreay. The old lady that we interviewed was about 85 years old.She told us that Thurso once consisted of fishing and flagstone industries.The smaller population was one of the main differences and people were not as friendly then as they are now. {"Punk Rocker"Fashions {An extreme example of fashion to be {seen around Thurso is the Punk fashion {-studded dog collars,nose and ear- {rings,tight bleached cotton trousers, {bleached cotton jackets with metal {chains and Mohican Indian hairstyles. {Ordinary people wear less exotic {clothes. {
